tossup_question: -   –  What type of optical aberration is unique to refracting telescopes relative to reflecting telescopes?
bonus_question: -   –  There are caves found in Bend, Oregon, just east of Mt. Jefferson. Based on their location, what type of rocks do you suspect make up these caves?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Sedimentary
X) Intrusive Igneous
Y) Extrusive Igneous
Z) Metamorphic
